title: Poster, "LIGHT/YEARS: Poster for the Architectural League's Beaux Arts Ball, March 13, 1999, sponsored by Artemide", 1999
medium: Off-set lithograph on white wove paper
description: Black and white poster composed of white sans serif font spelling the words "Light" and "Years" which are superimposed to create a flickering image.

exhibitions.title: Looking Forward/ Looking Back: Recent Acquisitions in 20th- and 21st-Century Design

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "LIGHT/YEARS: Poster for the Architectural League's Beaux Arts Ball, March 13, 1999, sponsored by Artemide", 1999.
1999. Off-set lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Michael Bierut. 2007-12-2.
